title: Reservoir
creator_credit: Allan Martel and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A straightforward informative film, this documentary describes the assembly of a pre-fabricated reservoir in Golden, British Columbia, by a handful of people using ordinary tools. Because of its low cost and easy assembly, this new type of reservoir spells hope for countries where water and money are in low supply.
creator_credit_for_label: Allan Martel and National Film Board of Canada
